name: Moodle Essentials Dark Monochrome
description: Dark Monochrome theme for moodle sites using the Essentials theme. Designed for ULL Moodle but probably works on others that use that theme.
additional_info: May cause highlighted text in posts to be difficult to read if the author selected a light color highlight and didn't change the text color from the default. You can work around this by selecting the text.
